text: Carlos Ernesto Fernando Ferrero Costa (7 February 1941 – 31 January 2025) was a Peruvian politician. He was a member of Perú Posible. He represented Lima in congress from 1995 until 2006. He was the President of the Congress from late-2000 until 2003. He was the Prime Minister of Peru from December 2003 until his resignation in August 2005. Ferrero died on 31 January 2025 in Lima at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Peru Category:Politicians from Lima
title: Carlos Ferrero
